title: Karat U2100 (Purple) 5.9" PS Heavy-Weight Disposable Teaspoon, Purple (Pack of 1000)
features: Color-coordinate with table settings for an easy way to add fun to any party
Sold as a case with 10 bags of 100 spoons for a total of 1,000 spoons
Purple color, Made from heavy-weight polystyrene
A cost-effective way to add color to any event! brighten your frozen yogurt business, or make your take-out business stand out
description: Founded by Alan Yu and Marvin Cheng, Karat paper and plastic disposable products are manufactured by Lollipop USA, Inc. Established in 2004 and based in Chino, CA, Karat specializes in food and beverage packaging products such as paper cups, plastic cups, food containers, dessert cups, cup lids, and more. Karat products may be mixed and matched to fulfill diverse needs and budgets, and can be used with products from most major brands, making it possible to effortlessly manage inventory changes. From large establishments to small neighborhood cafés, Lollipop provides the same top-grade products and high-quality service, along with one of the fastest turnaround production times in the industry. Color-coordinate with table settings for an easy way to add fun to any party. Sold as a case with 10 bags of 100 spoons for a total of 1,000 spoons. These spoons are 5.9” long . Purple color, made from heavy-weight polystyrene. A cost-effective way to add color to any event! brighten your frozen yogurt business, or make your take-out business stand out.
